message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, with its worth estimated at $1,200,000. I am extending to you a special offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true value and ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. My proposed price for this remarkable product is $1,150,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
